item.title: Wrapping arithmetic in Rust
item.description: One of Rusts great feature is that it catches integer overflows at runtime and panics rather than wraps (in debug builds). I recommend you read Huon's blog post about this from a couple years ago. While this is a desirable behaviour in general, integer overflows are commonly used when implementing cryptography primitives.
